meanings.definition: A reddish-brown oxide coating on iron or steel caused by the action of oxygen and moisture.
meanings.sent1: The old gate had patches of rust on its hinges.
meanings.sent2: After years of neglect, the metal railing showed signs of rust.
meanings.sent3: The rusty bike chain made a squeaky sound as it turned.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned car in the field was slowly consumed by rust.
meanings.sent5: The rust on the ship's anchor told stories of long voyages at sea.

meanings.sent1: Leaving the tools out in the rain caused them to rust quickly.
meanings.sent2: If you don't take care of your bike, it will eventually rust.
meanings.sent3: The metal statue began to rust after being exposed to the elements.
meanings.sent4: Neglecting to oil the hinges will make them rust over time.
meanings.sent5: The gate started to rust, showing the effects of neglect.

meanings.sent1: The autumn leaves had a beautiful rust hue.
meanings.sent2: Her hair had streaks of rust that shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The artist mixed red and brown paint to create a unique rust shade.
meanings.sent4: The old barn was painted in a charming rust color.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted the sky with hues of rust and gold.
